item.title: Simulated Data is All You Need: Bayesian Parameter Inference for Scientific Simulators with SBI
item.description: A EuroSciPy 2024 talk on using simulation-based inference (SBI) for Bayesian parameter estimation in scientific models, utilizing the sbi library.

item.title: Simulation-Based Inference Training
item.description: This course covers Simulation-Based Inference, a Bayesian approach for complex models using neural networks for density estimation.

item.title: Flexible and efficient simulation-based inference for models of decision-making
item.description: We introduce Mixed Neural Likelihood Estimation (MNLE), a simulation-based inference method for models with both continuous and discrete data, enabling efficient Bayesian inference in decision-making models.

item.title: SBI: Simulation-Based Inference Toolkit
item.description: SBI: A Python package for simulation-based inference

item.title: List of Irregular Verbs Across Romance Languages
item.description: This dataset contains all irregular verbs in known Romance languages.

item.title: Portugese Irregular Verbs
item.description: This book discusses Portugese irregular verbs in great details.
